InteractivityFactory

Event that is dispatched from any Movie Clip that inherits from HotSpot when the standard mouse actions are performed on the clip.

Summary

InteractivityFactory

public function InteractivityFactory()

Don’t ever call this.  Instantiating an instance of this class is useless.  Use the static function createActivity instead.
